title: Influence of weevil on the physicochemical characteristics, functional properties, and nutritional value of rice (Oryza sativa L.) produced at Yagoua (far-north Cameroon)
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Serge Cyrille Houketchang Ndomou, Beatrice Tapita Balti, Stephano Tene Tambo, Marie Madeleine Nanga Ndjang, Katlafadaou Kaskawa, Christiant Kouebou, Hilaire Macaire Womeni
